com.amazon.speech.json

Class SpeechletResponseEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.json.SpeechletResponseEnvelope

  • public class SpeechletResponseEnvelope
extends Object
    Envelope to wrap the response of a SpeechletV2 invocation as well as mutable elements of the SpeechletV2 invocation parameters.
    See Also:
    SpeechletResponse
